title: Tahoe Center Of Natural Medicine - Tahoe City, CA
description: 1 review of Tahoe Center Of Natural Medicine "I can't believe it's been so many years since anyone has reviewed this office. I've been going to this office for a month now to get my Vit B 12-Complex weekly injections. Both the doctor and the staff are very friendly, warm, caring, and helpful. As a local I highly recommend this office for any of your medical, weight loss, or general health questions."
